name: Mech Combat
description: The name of this respective game will be "Mech Combat". Basically, It is a wave based mech combat game whereby, the player is able to take control of a mech and destroy endless waves of explosive and turret wielding robots!. The Robot(Player) can also change it's perspective from FPP TO TPP and VICE VERSA. Engine used :- Unreal Engine. Language :- Blueprints (Provided by Unreal Engine). Front End :- Unreal Engine. Back End :- Blueprints.
